Boston area could get 2 to 4 inches of snow Saturday

The end of the week will likely bring another snowstorm potentially dropping 2 to 4 inches, according to the National Weather Service. (12:03 p.m.)

Beth Fujita had a serious conversation with Lauren Astley at a boutique where she worked, weeks before Astley was killed, according to a manager. (11:41 a.m.)

Olympic sprinter charged with murder

Paralympic superstar Oscar Pistorius has been charged with the murder of his girlfriend after model Reeva Steenkamp was shot inside the Olympic athlete’s home in South Africa. (10:05 a.m.)

Police hunt for driver who fled in Boston

State Police said the suspect abandoned a vehicle in the area of Beacon and Gloucester streets, fled on foot, and broke into homes near Marlborough Street. (11:39 a.m.)

Business

American, US Airways announce $11b merger

American Airlines and US Airways say they’re merging in a deal they value at $11 billion, creating the world’s biggest airline. The combined carrier will be called American Airlines.

Personal Finance

10 reasons to not cosign a loan

Co-signing. Just the word makes those of us at Bankrate shudder because we've seen so many tales of co-signing gone wrong. Our go-to rule is, "Just don't do it!" Why? For the biggest and most important reason of all: The risk outweighs the benefits.
